name: Check PCB status code after DLI queries
description: This rule searches for COBOL Programs which do not test the status code after calling the DL/I call.
output:
The report lists all Cobol Programs accessing IMS database without checking the status code returned by PCB. 

It provides the following information: 
- COBOL Program full name 
- Number of violations 

It also provides bookmarks for violation occurrences found in source code: 
- CBLTDLI call 
- Data structure associated to the PCB
rationale: When calling the DL/I call it is recommended to check the return code based on the call type in order to manage all situations that can occur.
remediation: Check the PCB status code after queries in order to manage all situations.
remediationSample:
CALL 'CBLTDLI' USING WS-GNP AAIRTCBF-PCB WS-RATE-CHILD. 
                                       
IF RTE-STATUS = 'GE' 
    MOVE 'Y' TO WS-EOJ 
END-IF 
... 
CALL 'CBLTDLI' USING WS-GN AAIRTCBF-PCB WS-RATE-CHILD. 
                                       
IF RTE-STATUS = 'GB' 
    MOVE 'Y' TO WS-EOJ 
END-IF
sample:
